t: Psalm 40
God Sustains His Servant.
For the choir director. A Psalm of David.
I*pn waited patiently for the Lord;*s And*ln He inclined to me and heard my cry.
He*ln brought me up out of the pit of destruction, out of the miry clay, And*ln He set my feet upon a rock making my footsteps firm.
He*ln put a new song in my mouth, a song of praise to our God; Many*ln will see and fear And*ln will trust in the Lord.*s
How*ln blessed is the man who has made the Lord*s his trust, And*ln has not turned to the proud, nor to those who lapse into falsehood.

Many,*ln O Lord*s my God, are the wonders which You have done, And*ln Your thoughts toward us; There*ln is none to compare with You. If*ln I would declare and speak of them, They*ln would be too numerous to count.
Sacrifice*ln and meal offering You have not desired; My*ln ears You have opened; Burnt*ln offering and sin offering You have not required.
Then*ln I said, “Behold, I come; In*ln the scroll of the book it is written of me.
I*ln delight to do Your will, O my God; Your*ln Law is within my heart.”
I*ln have proclaimed glad tidings of righteousness in the great congregation; Behold,*ln I will not restrain my lips, O*ln Lord,*s You know.

I*ln have not hidden Your righteousness within my heart; I*ln have spoken of Your faithfulness and Your salvation; I*ln have not concealed Your lovingkindness and Your truth from the great congregation.
You,*ln O Lord,*s will not withhold Your compassion from me; Your*ln lovingkindness and Your truth will continually preserve me.
For*ln evils beyond number have surrounded me; My*ln iniquities have overtaken me, so that I am not able to see; They*ln are more numerous than the hairs of my head, And*ln my heart has failed me.
Be*ln pleased, O Lord,*s to deliver me; Make*ln haste, O Lord,*s to help me.
Let*ln those be ashamed and humiliated together Who*ln seek my life to destroy it; Let*ln those be turned back and dishonored Who*ln delight in my hurt.
Let*ln those be appalled because of their shame Who*ln say to me, “Aha, aha!”
Let*ln all who seek You rejoice and be glad in You; Let*ln those who love Your salvation say continually, “The*ln Lord*s be magnified!”
Since*ln I am afflicted and needy, Let*ln the Lord be mindful of me. You*ln are my help and my deliverer; Do*ln not delay, O my God.
